data.name: ای دی سی
data.description: Iranian Development Communication (IDC) is an ICT engineering company that offers mobile and system solutions for Iran telecom and ICT industry.  IDC Co with the aim of providing professional service in the telecommunication and ICT field was established in 2003. Since then, IDC is one of the important dedicated contractors in Iran ICT market.  IDC also offers a complete turnkey solution and professional services to telecom operators in Iran. These services includes Planning, roll out ,
